There isn't much more you can do in town right now. It's time to EMBARK on a quest!
Click on the {colour_start|notable}[EMBARK]{colour_end} button at the buttom of the screen!

There isn't much more you can do in town right now. It's time to EMBARK on a quest!
Press {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH PAD RIGHT]{colour_end} to embark!

There isn't much more you can do in town right now. It's time to EMBARK on a quest!
Press {colour_start|notable}[START]{colour_end}!

Each item, if you take it, will occupy space in your inventory.
{colour_start|notable}Mouse over{colour_end} items to show details about them. This works in your inventory, too!
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

Each item, if you take it, will occupy space in your inventory.
Hold {colour_start|notable}[L2] and use [LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to show details about the items available to loot. This works in your inventory, too!
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

Each item, if you take it, will occupy space in your inventory.
Hold {colour_start|notable}[L BUTTON] and use [LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to show details about the items available to loot. This works in your inventory, too!
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

You'll want to take {colour_start|notable}different supplies{colour_end} depending on what {colour_start|notable}region{colour_end} you are going to, how {colour_start|notable}long{colour_end} the quest is, and your own preferences. But always bring some {colour_start|notable}food{colour_end} and {colour_start|notable}torches{colour_end}!
For your first short quest, try bringing at least 8 food and 4 torches.
To see details about any item, hold {colour_start|notable}[L2]{colour_end}. This works for inventory and loot windows, too!

You'll want to take {colour_start|notable}different supplies{colour_end} depending on what {colour_start|notable}region{colour_end} you are going to, how {colour_start|notable}long{colour_end} the quest is, and your own preferences.
For your first short quest, try bringing at least 8 food and 4 torches.
To see details about any item, hold {colour_start|notable}[L Button]{colour_end}. This works for inventory and loot windows, too!

This is where you select a quest and form an adventuring party of four heroes to embark on it.
{colour_start|notable}[CLICK]{colour_end} on quests to see their details.
{colour_start|notable}[DRAG]{colour_end} heroes into slots at the bottom of the screen to form your party and default party order.

This is where you select a quest and form an adventuring party of four heroes to embark on it.
{colour_start|notable}[SELECT]{colour_end} quests with {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to see their details.
Place heroes into slots at the bottom of the screen to form your party by holding{colour_start|notable}[R2]{colour_end} and using the {colour_start|notable}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end}.

This is where you select a quest and form an adventuring party of four heroes to embark on it.
Select quests with {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to see their details.
Place heroes into slots at the bottom of the screen to form your party by holding{colour_start|notable}[R]{colour_end} and using the {colour_start|notable}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end}.

You'll need to {colour_start|notable}recruit all of these heroes{colour_end} to fill out a party of four.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Drag and drop]{colour_end} them into your roster.

You'll need to {colour_start|notable}recruit all of these heroes{colour_end} to fill out a party of four.
Select each hero with {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK] plus [CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} and then use {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK] plus [CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} again to place the hero in your active roster on the right.

While you're here, spend some of your starting heirlooms on {colour_start|notable}upgrading the Stagecoach Network{colour_end}. This will increase the number of heroes available here in the future.
To upgrade, click the {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[+]{colour_end} symbol on the left, and then click the upgrade.

While you're here, spend some of your starting heirlooms on {colour_start|notable}upgrading the Stagecoach Network{colour_end}. This will increase the number of heroes available here in the future.
To upgrade, hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access the upgrades menu and then use {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK] plus [X BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase upgrades.

While you're here, spend some of your starting heirlooms on {colour_start|notable}upgrading the Stagecoach Network{colour_end}. This will increase the number of heroes available here in the future.
To upgrade, hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L BUTTON]{colour_end} to access the upgrades menu and then use {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK] plus [X BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase upgrades.

After you've completed the requirements of a quest, you have the option to {colour_start|notable}return to town{colour_end} at any time--just press {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH PAD RIGHT]{colour_end}. You don't need to return to the starting room of the dungeon to exit.
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

After you've completed the requirements of a quest, you have the option to {colour_start|notable}return to town{colour_end} at any time--just {colour_start|notable}[press START BUTTON]{colour_end}. You don't need to return to the starting room of the dungeon to exit.
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

When a hero is selected, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SQUARE BUTTON]{colour_end} to bring up a detailed panel showing all of the hero's {colour_start|notable}quirks{colour_end}, {colour_start|notable}skills{colour_end}, and {colour_start|notable}resistances{colour_end}.

On any screen in the game, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD LEFT]{colour_end} to see contextual help.
Try it while in town, exploring, fighting, camping, and more.

On any screen in the game, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECT BUTTON]{colour_end} and choose {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[HELP]{colour_end} to see contextual help.
Try it while in town, exploring, fighting, camping, and more.

Combat is {colour_start|notable}turn-based{colour_end}. On your hero's turn, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECT]{colour_end} a skill icon and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECT]{colour_end} a target.
If you can't select a particular skill, it's because that hero needs to be {colour_start|notable}standing in a different spot{colour_end} or there are {colour_start|notable}no valid targets{colour_end}. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[HIGHLIGHT]{colour_end} the skill to see the requirements.

You are currently in a {colour_start|notable}room{colour_end}.
To move towards another room, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to select a {colour_start|notable}destination room{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}map{colour_end}. This will take you to the {colour_start|notable}connecting hallway{colour_end}.
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

You are currently in a {colour_start|notable}room{colour_end}.
To move towards another room, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to select a {colour_start|notable}destination room{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}map{colour_end}. This will take you to the {colour_start|notable}connecting hallway{colour_end}.

While in a {colour_start|notable}hallway{colour_end}, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to move forward or backward.
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

While exploring, you will often find {colour_start|notable}interactive objects{colour_end}. Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to investigate them with the active hero. Take a look at this tent...
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CIRCLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to close this window.)

Your hero is {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}bleeding{colour_end}!
If you wish, you can use a {colour_start|notable}bandage{colour_end} from inventory to stop the flow. Select the bandage and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to use it when it's the injured hero's turn.

Select and use Anti-Venom, Bandages, or Medicinal Herbs from inventory with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to heal BLIGHT, BLEED, or DEBUFFS on the current hero, respectively.

The {colour_start|notable}light{colour_end} is fading! The current {colour_start|notable}torch level greatly affects many mechanics{colour_end} in the game. The darker it gets, the harder things get but the better the rewards. Select a torch in inventory and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to consume it and boost the light back up.

This quest involves {colour_start|notable}Camping{colour_end} and Camping requires {colour_start|notable}firewood{colour_end}. Firewood is {colour_start|notable}given automatically{colour_end} to you on appropriate quests.
{colour_start|notable}Camping{colour_end} gives heroes a chance to {colour_start|notable}recuperate while in the dungeon{colour_end}. When you are wounded or stressed and wish to camp, select firewood in your inventory and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end}.

Scouted {colour_start|trap}traps{colour_end} will be {colour_start|notable}visible on the ground{colour_end} as you approach them. Select a hero and then press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} while near the {colour_start|trap}trap{colour_end} to attempt to {colour_start|notable}disarm it{colour_end}.
When heroes are within range of a scouted trap, the trap icon will show up in their status bars.
Some heroes are better than others at disarming.
To enter a {colour_start|notable}door{colour_end}, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} when standing in front of it.

Each hero has slots to equip two items, called {colour_start|notable}trinkets{colour_end}. Just select the trinket in inventory and press {colour_start|notable}[CROSS BUTTON] {colour_end} to equip it. {colour_start|notable}Trinkets{colour_end} generally have a trade-off: something good, something bad. Some are also restricted to one hero class.

You can sell back unwanted trinkets from your Trinket Inventory and make some money. Open the Trinket Inventory with {colour_start|notable}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end}, select a trinket you don't want, and then sell it with [SQUARE BUTTON].

A critical scouting success will sometimes reveal a {colour_start|notable}Secret Room{colour_end}! Advance to the tile marked with a star, and press {colour_start|notable}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to enter. Fabulous wealth and riches await those equipped with a {colour_start|notable}key{colour_end}...

Select a hero with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R2 plus LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and then press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SQUARE BUTTON]{colour_end} to inspect their character sheet. Skills can be selected, clothing color can be changed, and they can be renamed or dismissed permanently.

Select a hero with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R Button plus LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and then press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SQUARE BUTTON]{colour_end} to inspect their character sheet. Skills can be selected, clothing color can be changed, and they can be renamed or dismissed permanently.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L STICK and CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to enter buildings.
BLACKSMITH, GUILD, SURVIVALIST: upgrade hero skills and equipment
TAVERN, ABBEY: send heroes for {colour_start|stressNOT1}stress{colour_end} relief
SANITARIUM: treat heroes' quirks and diseases
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD RIGHT]{colour_end} when ready to {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}EMBARK ON A QUEST{colour_end}.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[START BUTTON]{colour_end} when ready to {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}EMBARK ON A QUEST{colour_end}.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
With a hero selected, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SQUARE BUTTON]{colour_end} to inspect them.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to hire and place new heroes into your roster.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero from your roster into the Blacksmith slot to see their weapon and armor upgrade options.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Select]{colour_end} upgrades and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase them. You may need to upgrade the Blacksmith before purchasing certain hero upgrades.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero from your roster into the Guild to see their skill upgrade options.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Select]{colour_end} combat skills or combat skill upgrades and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase them. You may need to upgrade the Guild before purchasing certain hero upgrades.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero from your roster into the Survivalist to see their Camping skill upgrade options.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Select]{colour_end} skills or upgrades and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase them. You may need to upgrade the Survivalist before purchasing certain hero upgrades.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero from your roster into the appropriate slot and confirm payment with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to begin a stress-relieving activity.
Some quirks will block a hero from taking part in that activity.
Each activity has different costs, {colour_start|stressNOT1}stress{colour_end} relief values, and possible side-effects. You will have to discover some of them through play.
Committing the hero to the activity will make them unavailable for the next quest.
You will need to upgrade the building to unlock additional activity slots.

Select an unoccupied building slot and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to eject the hero from the building activity prematurely. You will not be refunded the money spent.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero from your roster into the appropriate slot and confirm payment with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to begin a stress-relieving activity.
Some quirks will block a hero from taking part in that activity.
Each activity has different costs, {colour_start|stressNOT1}stress{colour_end} relief values, and possible side-effects. You will have to discover some of them through play.
Committing the hero to the activity will make them unavailable for the next quest.
You will need to upgrade the building to unlock additional activity slots.

Select an unoccupied building slot and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to eject the hero from the building activity prematurely. You will not be refunded the money spent.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.

Treating quirks: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero into a treatment ward slot and select a positive quirk to reinforce and/or a negative quirk to remove. Severe quirks cost more to remove.
Treating diseases: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Place]{colour_end} a hero into a medical ward slot and select a disease to treat. Sometimes extra diseases will also be cured.
Committing the hero to treatment will make them unavailable for the next quest.
You will need to upgrade the building to unlock additional treatment slots.

Select an unoccupied building slot and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to eject the hero from the building activity prematurely. You will not be refunded the money spent.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Select]{colour_end} an available item and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase it.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Select]{colour_end} heroes and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to add them into the adventuring party.
Heroes that are in the Tavern, Abbey, or Sanitarium will be unavailable for use.
Complete quests in regions to advance your Mastery in that region and open up new quest types.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD RIGHT]{colour_end} when ready to proceed to Provisioning.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[START BUTTON]{colour_end} when ready to proceed to Provisioning.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Select]{colour_end} items in the shop and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase them for the expedition.
At quest end, unused provisions will be discarded without repayment. Buy only as much as you need!
You'll always want to carry some food and torches! Each hero generally eats 1 food unit per meal (Camping or Hunger event) and even on short quests you'll want at least 8 torches.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to choose a new room destination and enter the connecting hallway.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R1 and L1]{colour_end} to change active hero.
Tap {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[REAR TOUCH PAD]{colour_end} to change active hero.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[UP BUTTON and DOWN BUTTON]{colour_end} to toggle between INVENTORY and MAP.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to move a hero within the party. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Hold CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to restore default order.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to move a hero within the party.
To start CAMPING, select firewood in inventory (if you have any) and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end}.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to view gameplay info.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD RIGHT]{colour_end} to abandon the quest and return to the Hamlet.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[START BUTTON]{colour_end} to abandon the quest and return to the Hamlet.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R Button]{colour_end} to access map controls.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SQUARE BUTTON]{colour_end} to see a hero's detailed character sheet.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to walk forward or backward.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[UP BUTTON and DOWN BUTTON]{colour_end} to toggle between INVENTORY and MAP.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R1 and L1]{colour_end} to change hero selection.
Tap {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[REAR TOUCH PAD]{colour_end} to change active hero.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to move a hero within the party. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Hold CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to restore default order.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to move a hero within the party.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R Button]{colour_end} to access map controls.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD RIGHT]{colour_end} to abandon the quest and return to the Hamlet.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[START BUTTON]{colour_end} to abandon the quest and return to the Hamlet.

On hero's turn, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to select a valid combat skill and then a target.

Each skill has requirements for where the hero needs to be standing and what enemies they can target. Select a skill with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to see the requirements.

When selecting a target with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end}, you can see that enemy's stats and the hero's chance to hit / damage values with the currently selected skill.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SQUARE BUTTON]{colour_end} to see a hero's detailed character sheet.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} to view current light level and hero / monster status effects.
Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L Button]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions.

Select and use Anti-Venom, Bandages, or Medicinal Herbs from inventory with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to heal BLIGHT, BLEED, or DEBUFFS on the current hero, respectively.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to highlight a meal option and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to eat. You are limited by how much food you have in inventory.
Your party has {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[12 RESPITE POINTS]{colour_end} to spend on using Camping skills.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L1 and R1]{colour_end} to select a hero and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK and CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to use a skill. Some skills require a target to be selected.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[REAR TOUCH PAD]{colour_end} to select a hero and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK and CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to use a skill. Some skills require a target to be selected.
When done spending RESPITE POINTS, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRIANGLE BUTTON]{colour_end} to finish camping.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to select a destination room on the map.
Hold [L2] and press [CIRCLE BUTTON] to reduce torchlight.
Hold [L2] and press [CIRCLE BUTTON] repeatedly to snuff out the torch.
Your save file appears to have been corrupted. Estate cannot be loaded.
Press [CROSS BUTTON] to dismiss hero word balloons.
[Hold TRIANGLE BUTTON] to discard an item.
[CROSS BUTTON] to commit hero for treatment.
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CROSS BUTTON]{colour_end} to recruit into roster.
[CROSS BUTTON] to commit hero for treatment.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to select a destination room on the map.
Hold [L BUTTON] and press [CIRCLE BUTTON] to reduce torchlight.
Hold [L BUTTON] and press [CIRCLE BUTTON] repeatedly to snuff out the torch.
Replace empty slot with downloaded estate [%s]?
Replace local slot [%s] with downloaded estate [%s]?
Downloaded data is not a recognizable Estate save. Cross-Save storage may be corrupt.
Try to download from Cross-Save to this slot?
Try to upload this estate to Cross-Save?
Hold {colour_start|notable}[L2]{colour_end} to see details about torchlight, combat status, inventory items, and more!
Hold {colour_start|notable}[L2]{colour_end} to see details about torchlight, combat status, inventory items, and more!
Hold {colour_start|notable}[L2]{colour_end} to see details about torchlight, combat status, inventory items, and more!

Word of our predicament has spread, and a new crop of aspiring corpses step from the stagecoach...

Heroes gain {colour_start|notable}Resolve XP{colour_end} for each successful quest. {colour_start|notable}Resolve XP{colour_end} in turn determines the hero's {colour_start|notable}Resolve Level{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}Resolve Level{colour_end} represents the hero's veteranship, and directly acts as {colour_start|notable}Stress Resistance{colour_end} against the horrors encountered in the dungeons.
A low {colour_start|notable}Resolve Level{colour_end} hero that tries a higher level quest will quickly crumble under the unimaginable stresses.

When most monsters die, they leave corpses. Corpses act as temporary obstacles and will eventually go away on their own.
You can attack corpses to destroy them faster, but often a better approach is to use ranged skills, push/pull skills, and even corpse-clearing special skills that some heroes possess.
Monsters killed with bleed, blight, or crits leave no corpses at all!
Use Camping skills to help the heroes.
Deep within the shattered vaults of your ancestral home, a Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals even raising the dead! It must be stopped.
A man tells of a beast so terrible that the swinefolk have made it their Lord. Perhaps it is only rumor and shadow, but this threat cannot be left to fester.
A man tells of a beast so terrible that the swinefolk have made it their Lord. Perhaps it is only rumor and shadow, but this threat cannot be left to fester.
A man tells of a beast so terrible that the swinefolk have made it their Lord. Perhaps it is only rumor and shadow, but this threat cannot be left to fester.
Raving madman, doom bearer, apocalyptic herald. Whatever his role, there is a sickness in his wild sermons that must be silenced. Dispose of this "Prophet."
Raving madman, doom bearer, apocalyptic herald. Whatever his role, there is a sickness in his wild sermons that must be silenced. Dispose of this "Prophet."
Raving madman, doom bearer, apocalyptic herald. Whatever his role, there is a sickness in his wild sermons that must be silenced. Dispose of this "Prophet."
Some things were never meant to live. Cleanse the sin of the Ancestor's experimentations and put this abomination into the abyss where it belongs.
Some things were never meant to live. Cleanse the sin of the Ancestor's experimentations and put this abomination into the abyss where it belongs.
Some things were never meant to live. Cleanse the sin of the Ancestor's experimentations and put this abomination into the abyss where it belongs.
The vengeful wraiths threaten to drag all we've built down into their domain of darkness. Give them a sailor's death - once and for all!
The vengeful wraiths threaten to drag all we've built down into their domain of darkness. Give them a sailor's death - once and for all!
The vengeful wraiths threaten to drag all we've built down into their domain of darkness. Give them a sailor's death - once and for all!
Test yourself in the mad realm of your fallen ancestor. Take note of how the creatures have taken over, but don't delve too far.
Is an apocalypse building? Cinch your packs and delve far, far into the tunnels of your fallen family. Make a map of your expedition.
The unholy abominations inhabiting the crumbling house have turned beacons of Light into vessels for diabolical worship. Cleanse these altars with Consecrated Essence.
Take the Old Road into the wood and then pick any of the dozens of dark paths. Test that path and then return with your heads intact.
The Weald was nearly inscrutable even before the corruption. Now it is nothing but mystery. Provision well and mount an expedition to map as much ground as you can.
Many a cart-driver has met their end while traversing the Weald. A king's ransom of medicines was recently lost. They would assist in rebuilding this sickly hamlet.
Blighted corpses lay strewn about the Old Road, teeming with disease. Journeys to and fro pose constant threat of sickness. Destroy this blight with Potent Salve.
The swine's appetite for comestibles exceeds even their thirst for blood. Winter is always close, and the Hamlet would do well to restock its sparse larder.
Your Ancestor was receiving eldritch relics via marine shipments. Find and return them to town where they can be stored safely out of the hands of greater evils.
With the stagecoach destroyed and the Caretaker gone, you will have to make the journey to the Hamlet on foot.

Darkest Dungeon is about making the most of a bad situation. Quests will fail or must be abandoned. Heroes will die. And when they die, they stay dead. Progress autosaves frequently, so actions are permanent.

While in dungeons, holding left trigger is required before you can swap hero positions, change hero selection, or view character sheets. Turn this on if you frequently start swapping a hero's position when you didn't intend to.

While in dungeons, holding L2 Button is required before you can swap hero positions, change hero selection, or view character sheets. Turn this on if you frequently start swapping a hero's position when you didn't intend to.

While in dungeons, holding L2 Button is required before you can swap hero positions, change hero selection, or view character sheets. Turn this on if you frequently start swapping a hero's position when you didn't intend to.

While in dungeons, holding L Button is required before you can swap hero positions, change hero selection, or view character sheets. Turn this on if you frequently start swapping a hero's position when you didn't intend to.
No Rear Touch Pad in Dungeon
While walking in dungeons, use Left and Right Buttons for hero swapping instead of Rear Touch Pad. Turn this option ON if you frequently accidentally tap the Rear Touch Pad while exploring.
Use Left and Right Buttons in Dungeon
While walking in dungeons, use Left and Right Buttons for hero swapping instead of L1 and L2 Buttons.
While in dungeons, pressing up on L Stick can be used to enter doors, open curios, and similar actions. (This duplicates Cross Button functionality.)
Turning this off disables rear touch pad inputs and uses the front touchscreen instead for the same things. Do this if you find yourself accidentally tapping the rear touch pad.

Le combat est {colour_start|notable}au tour par tour{colour_end}. Lorsque c'est le tour de votre hros, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CHOISISSEZ]{colour_end} une icne de comptence puis une cible{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}{colour_end}.
Si vous ne pouvez pas slectionner une comptence particulire, c'est parce que {colour_start|notable}la position du hros n'est pas adapte{colour_end} ou qu'il n'y a {colour_start|notable}aucune cible valide{colour_end}. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PASSEZ]{colour_end} sur la comptence pour en voir les conditions.

En exploration, vous trouverez souvent des {colour_start|notable}objets interactifs{colour_end}. Appuyez sur la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE CROIX]{colour_end} pour les examiner avec le hros actif. Jetez donc un il cette tente...

Votre hros {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}saigne{colour_end}!
Si vous voulez, vous pouvez utiliser un {colour_start|notable}bandage{colour_end} depuis l'inventaire pour arrter l'hmorragie. Slectionnez le bandage et appuyez sur la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE TRIANGLE]{colour_end} pour l'utiliser lors du tour du hros bless.

Choisissez et utilisez un antivenin, des bandages ou des herbes mdicinales, depuis votre inventaire avec le {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[JOYSTICK GAUCHE]{colour_end} et la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE TRIANGLE]{colour_end} pour soigner respectivement INFECTION, SAIGNEMENT et MALUS sur le hros actif.

La {colour_start|notable}lumire{colour_end} s'affaiblit! Le {colour_start|notable}niveau de torche affecte fortement un grand nombre de mcanismes{colour_end} dans le jeu. Plus il fait sombre, plus les choses se compliquent, mais meilleures sont les rcompenses. Choisissez une torche dans l'inventaire et appuyez sur la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE TRIANGLE]{colour_end} pour l'allumer et ajouter de la lumire.

Cette qute inclut un {colour_start|notable}camp{colour_end}, et camper requiert du {colour_start|notable}bois{colour_end}. Le bois est {colour_start|notable}automatiquement fourni{colour_end} pour les qutes appropries.
{colour_start|notable}Le camp{colour_end} donne une chance aux hros de {colour_start|notable}rcuprer pendant un donjon{colour_end}. Si vous tes bless ou stress et que vous voulez camper, slectionnez le bois dans votre inventaire et appuyez sur la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE TRIANGLE]{colour_end}.

Les {colour_start|trap}piges{colour_end} reprs seront {colour_start|notable}visibles au sol{colour_end} lorsque vous vous en approcherez. Slectionnez un hros, puis appuyez sur la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE CROIX]{colour_end} prs du {colour_start|trap}pige{colour_end} pour essayer de {colour_start|notable}le dsamorcer{colour_end}.
Certains hros sont meilleurs que d'autres pour le dsamorage.
Pour ouvrir une {colour_start|notable}porte{colour_end}, appuyez sur la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHE CROIX]{colour_end} quand vous tes face elle.

Chaque hros possde des emplacements pour s'quiper de deux objets, appels {colour_start|notable}breloques{colour_end}. Pour cela, slectionnez la breloque dans et appuyez sur la {colour_start|notable}[TOUCHE CROIX]{colour_end} pour l'quiper. {colour_start|notable}Les breloques{colour_end} proposent gnralement un bon compromis: une qualit, un dfaut. Certaines sont galement limites une classe de hros.

Vendez les breloques inutiles de votre inventaire pour gagner de l'argent. Ouvrez l'inventaire de breloques grce la {colour_start|notable}[TOUCHE TRIANGLE]{colour_end}, slectionnez celle dont vous ne voulez plus et vendez-la avec la [TOUCHE CARR].

Avec la diligence dtruit et le gardien disparu, vous aurez faire le voyage vers le hameau pied.

Dans Darkest Dungeon, vous vous battez contre plus fort que vous. Des qutes choueront ou seront abandonnes. Des hros mourront. Et ils mourront pour toujours. La progression est sauvegarde automatiquement, donc chaque action est dfinitive.

Dans un donjon, maintenir la touche L2 est ncessaire avant de pouvoir intervertir vos hros de position, modifier un hros slectionn ou consulter une feuille de personnage. Activez cette option si vous avez tendance intervertir vos hros de position par inadvertance.

Pas de pav tactile arrire en donjon

Lorsque vous explorez un donjon, utilisez les touches gauche et droite pour intervertir vos hros de position au lieu du pav tactile arrire. Activez cette option si vous avez tendance toucher le pav tactile arrire par inadvertance durant l'exploration.
Lorsque vous explorez un donjon, utilisez les touches gauche et droite pour intervertir vos hros de position au lieu des touches L1 et L2.
Dans un donjon, montez le joystick gauche vers le haut pour franchir une porte, ouvrir des curiosits ou autres actions similaires. (Ceci est un doublon de la fonctionnalit sur la touche Croix.)
Dsactiver ceci dsactivera galement la saisie par pav tactile arrire et utilisera l'cran tactile avant aux mmes fins. Faites ceci s'il vous arrive de toucher involontairement le pav tactile arrire.

Selecciona un hroe y pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN CUADRADO]{colour_end} para mostrar un panel con todos los detalles de sus {colour_start|notable}peculiaridades{colour_end}, {colour_start|notable}habilidades{colour_end} y {colour_start|notable}resistencias{colour_end}.

Si pulsas el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PANEL TCTIL IZQUIERDA]{colour_end} en cualquier pantalla del juego, se mostrar la ayuda contextual.
Prubalo cuando ests en la ciudad, luchando, de acampada y en otras situaciones.

Si pulsas el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN SELECT]{colour_end} y seleccionas {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[AYUDA]{colour_end}, se mostrar la ayuda contextual.
Prubalo cuando ests en la ciudad, luchando, de acampada y en otras situaciones.

El sistema de combate se desarrolla {colour_start|notable}por turnos{colour_end}. Durante el turno de tu hroe, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECCIONA]{colour_end} un icono de habilidad y despus {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECCIONA]{colour_end} un objetivo.
Si no puedes seleccionar una habilidad especfica, significa que el hroe debe {colour_start|notable}situarse en una posicin distinta{colour_end} o que {colour_start|notable}no hay objetivos vlidos{colour_end} disponibles.{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECCIONA]{colour_end} la habilidad para consultar sus requisitos.

Ahora ests en una {colour_start|notable}sala{colour_end}.
Usa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[JOYSTICK DERECHO]{colour_end} para seleccionar {colour_start|notable}otra sala{colour_end} del {colour_start|notable}mapa{colour_end}. Con esta accin avanzars hasta el {colour_start|notable}pasillo de conexin{colour_end}.
Pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN CRCULO]{colour_end} para cerrar esta ventana.

Ahora ests en una {colour_start|notable}sala{colour_end}.
Usa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[JOYSTICK DERECHO]{colour_end} para seleccionar {colour_start|notable}otra sala{colour_end} del {colour_start|notable}mapa{colour_end}. Con esta accin avanzars hasta el {colour_start|notable}pasillo de conexin{colour_end}.

Cuando ests en un {colour_start|notable}pasillo{colour_end}, usa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[JOYSTICK IZQUIERDO]{colour_end} para avanzar o retroceder.
Pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN CRCULO]{colour_end} para cerrar esta ventana.

Durante una exploracin, a menudo encontrars {colour_start|notable}objetos interactivos{colour_end}. Pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN EQUIS]{colour_end} para investigarlos. chale un vistazo a esta tienda.
Pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN CRCULO]{colour_end} para cerrar esta ventana.

Tu hroe est sufriendo una {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}hemorragia{colour_end}!
Puedes usar una {colour_start|notable}venda{colour_end} del inventario para detenerla. Selecciona la venda y pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN TRINGULO]{colour_end} para aplicarla durante el turno del hroe herido.

Selecciona y usa antdotos, vendas o hierbas medicinales del inventario con el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[JOYSTICK IZQUIERDO]{colour_end} y el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN TRINGULO]{colour_end} para curar la PESTE, una HEMORRAGIA o eliminar MERMAS, respectivamente.

La {colour_start|notable}luz{colour_end} se est desvaneciendo! El {colour_start|notable}nivel de la antorcha afecta a numerosas mecnicas{colour_end} del juego. Cuanto ms oscuro est, ms se complicar la situacin, pero mejores recompensas podrs conseguir. Selecciona una antorcha del inventario y pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN TRINGULO]{colour_end} para encenderla e incrementar la luminosidad.

Esta misin incluye una {colour_start|notable}acampada{colour_end}, para lo que necesitars {colour_start|notable}lea{colour_end}. Recibirs lea {colour_start|notable}automticamente{colour_end} en determinadas misiones.
{colour_start|notable}Acampa{colour_end} para que tus hroes puedan {colour_start|notable}recuperarse mientras estn en una mazmorra{colour_end}. Cuando tus hroes estn heridos o agotados por el esfuerzo y quieras acampar, selecciona lea de tu inventario y pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN TRINGULO]{colour_end}.

Las {colour_start|trap}trampas{colour_end} detectadas sern {colour_start|notable}visibles en el terreno{colour_end} cuando te aproximes a ellas. Selecciona un hroe y pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN EQUIS]{colour_end} cuando ests cerca de la {colour_start|trap}trampa{colour_end} para intentar {colour_start|notable}desmantelarla{colour_end}.
Algunos hroes son mejores que otros desmantelando trampas.
Para atravesar una {colour_start|notable}puerta{colour_end}, pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN EQUIS]{colour_end} cuando ests frente a ella.

Cada hroe puede equiparse con dos objetos llamados {colour_start|notable}abalorios{colour_end}. Selecciona uno del inventario y pulsa el {colour_start|notable}[BOTN EQUIS]{colour_end} para equiparte con l. Por lo general, los {colour_start|notable}abalorios{colour_end} aportan algo positivo y algo negativo. Adems, algunos solo pueden usarse con una clase especfica de hroe.

Puedes vender los abalorios que no necesites a cambio de dinero. Accede al inventario de abalorios usando el {colour_start|notable}[BOTN TRINGULO]{colour_end}, selecciona el abalorio del que quieras desprenderte y vndelo con el [BOTN CUADRADO].

Durante las exploraciones, puede que descubras una{colour_start|notable}sala secreta{colour_end}! Avanza hasta la casilla marcada con una estrella y pulsa el {colour_start|notable}[BOTN EQUIS]{colour_end} para entrar. Riquezas fabulosas aguardan a aquellos que tengan la {colour_start|notable}llave{colour_end}...

Selecciona un hroe con {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R2 y el JOYSTICK IZQUIERDO]{colour_end} y despus pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN CUADRADO]{colour_end} para consultar su informacin. Podrs seleccionar habilidades, modificar el color de la ropa, cambiar su nombre o destituirlo permanentemente.

Selecciona un hroe con el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN R y el JOYSTICK IZQUIERDO]{colour_end} y despus pulsa el {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTN CUADRADO]{colour_end} para consultar su informacin. Podrs seleccionar habilidades, modificar el color de la ropa, cambiar su nombre o destituirlo permanentemente.

SANATORIO: Se tratan las enfermedades de los hroes y sus peculiaridades.

Han atendido nuestras plegarias: la diligencia llega cargada con un nuevo contingente de cadveres potenciales...

Los hroes obtienen {colour_start|notable}EXP de determinacin{colour_end} por superar misiones. La {colour_start|notable}EXP de determinacin{colour_end} establece el {colour_start|notable}nivel de determinacin{colour_end} del hroe.
El {colour_start|notable}nivel de determinacin{colour_end} representa la veterana del hroe y sirve de {colour_start|notable}resistencia al esfuerzo{colour_end} contra los horrores que se ocultan en las mazmorras.

Cuando los monstruos mueren en combate, suelen dejar sus cadveres tras de s. Estos cadveres son obstculos temporales que desaparecen con el tiempo.
Tambin puedes atacar a los cadveres para hacer que desaparezcan rpidamente, aunque la mejor estrategia suele ser utilizar habilidades a distancia, de empuje/arrastre o las habilidades especficas para eliminar cadveres de algunos hroes.
Usa las habilidades de acampada para ayudar a los hroes.
En las profundidades de las ruinas de tus ancestros, un nigromante est realizando rituales atroces... incluso est resucitando a los muertos! Hay que detenerlo.
Un aventurero habla de una bestia tan terrible que los porcinos la han convertido en su seor. Puede que sea un rumor, pero hay que impedir que esta amenaza crezca.

Loco de remate, portador de una maldicin, heraldo apocalptico. Sus sermones enfermos desprenden un odio que hay que silenciar. Acaba con este profeta.

Algunas cosas no estn hechas para vivir. Purifica los pecados de los experimentos ancestrales y enva esta abominacin de vuelta al abismo al que pertenece.

Esos espectros amenazan con arrebatar todo lo que hemos construido y llevrselo a su reino de oscuridad. Dales la muerte del marinero... de una vez por todas!

Esos espectros amenazan con arrebatar todo lo que hemos construido y llevrselo a su reino de oscuridad. Dales la muerte del marinero... de una vez por todas!
Ponte a prueba en el demente reino de tus ancestros cados. Estudia cmo han invadido el reino las criaturas, pero no ahondes demasiado.
Est llegando el apocalipsis? Prepara las provisiones y adntrate en los tneles que recorrieron tus familiares cados. Haz un mapa de tu expedicin.
Los seres que hay en la casa en ruinas han hecho de las antorchas instrumentos de veneracin diablica. Purifica los altares con esencia consagrada y recupera la luz.
Recorre el Camino Viejo hasta llegar al bosque y escoge uno de los muchos senderos oscuros. Recorre ese sendero y regresa de una pieza.
La foresta ya era prcticamente inescrutable antes de la corrupcin. Ahora solo es un misterio oscuro. Aprovisinate bien y forma una expedicin para explorar la zona.
Muchos carreteros han muerto en los senderos de la foresta. Un rescate de medicinas del rey fue abandonado. Seran de ayuda para reconstruir este poblado enfermo.
Los cadveres putrefactos estn esparcidos por el Camino Viejo. Salir y entrar en el poblado es un peligro para la salud. Destruye esta infeccin con ungento potente.
El apetito de los porcinos por comer alimentos comestibles supera incluso su sed de sangre. El invierno amenaza y el poblado necesita reabastecer su escasa alacena.
Tu ancestro reciba reliquias de eldritchs a travs de envos marinos. Encuntralas y devulvelas a la ciudad para ponerlas a buen recaudo, la salvo de males mayores.
Con la diligencia destruida y el vigilante ha ido, usted tendr que hacer el viaje a la Aldea a pie.

En Darkest Dungeon hay que sacarle el mximo partido a una situacin adversa. Las misiones fracasarn o se abandonarn. Los hroes morirn y, cuando mueran, permanecern muertos. Los progresos se guardan automticamente de forma constante, por lo que tus acciones sern permanentes.

En las mazmorras, es necesario mantener pulsado el botn L2 para cambiar de posicin a tus hroes, ver su informacin o cambiar de hroe seleccionado. Activa esta opcin si sueles cambiar de posicin a tus hroes por error.

Evitar el panel tctil trasero en mazmorras

Mientras caminas por una mazmorra, cambia de hroe con los botones hacia la derecha y hacia la izquierda en vez de con el panel tctil trasero. Activa esta opcin si sueles confundirte y tocar el panel tctil trasero mientras exploras.
Usar los botones hacia la derecha y hacia la izquierda en mazmorras
Mientras caminas por una mazmorra, cambia de hroe con los botones hacia la derecha y hacia la izquierda en vez de con los botones L1 y L2.

Interaccionar con el joystick izquierdo hacia arriba
En las mazmorras, pulsa el joystick izquierdo hacia arriba para cruzar puertas, abrir objetos interactivos y realizar acciones similares. (Con el botn equis puedes realizar las mismas acciones).
Al desactivar esta opcin, se deshabilitar el panel tctil trasero y en su lugar se usar la pantalla tctil frontal. Te recomendamos esta opcin si sueles tocar el panel tctil trasero sin querer.

O combate {colour_start|notable}baseado em turnos{colour_end}. Na vez do seu heri, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECIONE]{colour_end} um cone de habilidade e depois {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELECIONE]{colour_end} um alvo.
Se voc no conseguir selecionar uma habilidade especfica, porque seu heri precisa estar {colour_start|notable}em um lugar diferente{colour_end} ou no h {colour_start|notable}nenhum alvo vlido{colour_end}. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DESTAQUE]{colour_end} a habilidade para ver os requisitos.

Agora voc est em uma {colour_start|notable}sala{colour_end}.
Para avanar para outra sala, use o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CONTROLE DIREITO]{colour_end} para selecionar uma {colour_start|notable}sala de destino{colour_end} no {colour_start|notable}mapa{colour_end}. Isso o levar at o {colour_start|notable}corredor de ligao{colour_end}.
(Pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO CRCULO]{colour_end} para fechar esta janela.)

Agora voc est em uma {colour_start|notable}sala{colour_end}.
Para avanar para outra sala, use o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CONTROLE DIREITO]{colour_end} para selecionar uma {colour_start|notable}sala de destino{colour_end} no {colour_start|notable}mapa{colour_end}. Isso o levar at o {colour_start|notable}corredor de ligao{colour_end}.

Quando estiver em um {colour_start|notable}corredor{colour_end}, use o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CONTROLE ESQUERDO]{colour_end} para se mover para frente e para trs.
(Pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO CRCULO]{colour_end} para fechar esta janela.)

Durante a explorao, voc encontrar {colour_start|notable}objetos interativos{colour_end}. Pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO X]{colour_end} para investig-los com o heri ativo. D uma olhada nesta tenda...
(Pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO CRCULO]{colour_end} para fechar esta janela.)

Seu heri est {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}sangrando{colour_end}!
Se quiser, voc pode usar uma {colour_start|notable}bandagem{colour_end} do inventrio para estancar a hemorragia. Selecione a bandagem e pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO TRINGULO]{colour_end} para us-la quando for a vez do heri ferido.

Selecione o Antiveneno, Bandagens ou Ervas medicinais do seu inventrio com o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CONTROLE ESQUERDO]{colour_end} e {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO TRINGULO]{colour_end} para curar PESTE, SANGRAMENTO ou PENALIDADES no heri atual, respectivamente.

A {colour_start|notable}luz{colour_end} est apagando! O nvel atual da {colour_start|notable}tocha afeta bastante diversas mecnicas{colour_end} no jogo. Quanto mais escuro estiver, mais difcil as coisas ficam, mas melhores so as recompensas. Selecione uma tocha no inventrio e pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO TRINGULO]{colour_end} para consumi-la e aumentar a luz de novo.

Esta misso envolve {colour_start|notable}acampamento{colour_end}, e o acampamento requer {colour_start|notable}lenha{colour_end}. A Lenha {colour_start|notable}fornecida automaticamente{colour_end} a voc nas misses apropriadas.
Com o {colour_start|notable}Acampamento{colour_end} os heris tm a chance de se {colour_start|notable}recuperar enquanto estiverem na masmorra{colour_end}. Quando voc estiver ferido ou estressado e quiser acampar, selecione a lenha em seu inventrio e pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO TRINGULO]{colour_end}.

{colour_start|trap}Armadilhas{colour_end} reconhecidas ficaro {colour_start|notable}visveis no cho{colour_end} conforme voc se aproximar delas. Escolha um heri e em seguida pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO X]{colour_end} quando estiver perto da {colour_start|trap}armadilha{colour_end} para tentar {colour_start|notable}desarm-la{colour_end}.
Alguns heris so melhores que outros para desarmar.
Para entrar por uma {colour_start|notable}porta{colour_end}, pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO X]{colour_end} quando estiver na frente dela.

Cada heri tem espaos para equipar dois itens, chamados de {colour_start|notable}preciosidades{colour_end}. Basta selecionar a preciosidade no inventrio e pressionar o {colour_start|notable}[BOTO X]{colour_end} para equip-la. As {colour_start|notable}Preciosidades{colour_end} costumam ter um equilbrio: algo bom, algo ruim. Algumas so restritas a uma classe de heri especfica.

Voc pode vender preciosidades indesejadas do seu inventrio de preciosidades para obter dinheiro. Abra o inventrio de preciosidades com o {colour_start|notable}[BOTO TRINGULO]{colour_end}, selecione o item indesejado e venda-o com o [BOTO QUADRADO].

Um sucesso de reconhecimento crtico s vezes revela uma {colour_start|notable}sala secreta{colour_end}! Avance para a casa marcada com uma estrela e pressione o {colour_start|notable}[BOTO X]{colour_end} para entrar. Grandes riquezas aguardam aqueles que possurem uma {colour_start|notable}chave{colour_end}...

Selecione um heri com {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R2 mais CONTROLE ESQUERDO]{colour_end} e depois pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO QUADRADO]{colour_end} para inspecionar sua ficha de personagem. Habilidades podem ser selecionadas, a cor das roupas podem ser alteradas e eles podem ser renomeados ou dispensados permanentemente.

Selecione um heri com o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Boto R mais CONTROLE ESQUERDO]{colour_end} e depois pressione o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[BOTO QUADRADO]{colour_end} para inspecionar sua ficha de personagem. Habilidades podem ser selecionadas, a cor das roupas podem ser alteradas e eles podem ser renomeados ou dispensados permanentemente.
Use o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CONTROLE ESQUERDO e o BOTO X]{colour_end} para entrar em estruturas.
FERREIRO, GUILDA, PERITA EM SOBREVIVNCIA: melhore as armas e armaduras dos heris

6 recrutas a mais do que o normal

Os heris ganham {colour_start|notable}EXP de determinao{colour_end} a cada misso bem-sucedida. A {colour_start|notable}EXP de determinao{colour_end} determina o {colour_start|notable}Nvel de Determinao{colour_end} do heri.
O {colour_start|notable}Nvel de Determinao{colour_end} representa a experincia do heri e funciona diretamente como {colour_start|notable}Resistncia ao Estresse{colour_end} dos horrores encontrados nas masmorras.

Quando a maioria dos monstros morrem, eles deixam corpos. Corpos funcionam como obstculos temporrios e somem sozinhos depois de um tempo.
Voc pode atacar os corpos destruindo-os mais rpido, embora muitas vezes o melhor seja usar habilidades de longo alcance, de empurra/puxar e at mesmo habilidades especiais de eliminar corpos que alguns heris possuem.
Use habilidades de acampamento para ajudar os heris.
Nas profundezes das cmaras arruinadas do seu lar ancestral, um necromante est realizando rituais profanos... e revivendo os mortos! Ele deve ser detido.
Um homem conta sobre uma fera to terrvel que o povo suno a escolheu como seu lder. Talvez seja apenas um boato, mas essa ameaa no pode ser ignorada.

Louco delirante, profeta do fim do mundo, arauto do apocalipse. Seja qual for o seu papel, h uma maldade em seus sermes que deve ser silenciada. Elimine o "Profeta".

Espectros vingativos ameaam arrastar tudo o que construmos para as profundezas do domnio da escurido. D a eles a morte de um marinheiro - de uma vez por todas!

Teste suas habilidades no mundo insano do ancestral cado. Veja como as criaturas dominaram, mas no se aventure longe demais.
Um apocalipse est se aproximando? Pegue suas malas e infiltre-se nas profundezas dos tneis de uma famlia amaldioada. Desenhe um mapa da sua expedio.
As abominaes profanas que habitam a casa arruinada transformaram objetos de Luz em meios de venerao diablica. Purifique os altares com a Essncia Consagrada.
Pegue a Velha Estrada para a floresta e depois escolha qualquer uma das trilhas sombrias. Teste o caminho e volte com a mente intacta.
Os Ermos eram quase impenetrveis mesmo antes da corrupo. Agora so um mistrio. Rena mantimentos e forme uma expedio para mapear o mximo que puder do territrio.
Muitos carroceiros encontraram seu fim na estrada dos Ermos. Uma carga de remdios do rei foi perdida. Eles seriam teis para ajudar a reconstruir esta aldeia doente.
Cadveres infectados esto espalhados pela Velha Estrada, cheios de doenas. Jornadas para a Aldeia trazem sempre uma ameaa. Destrua esta peste com o Blsamo Potente.
O apetite dos sunos por comestveis excede mesmo sua sede de sangue. O inverno est sempre prximo e a Aldeia tem que abastecer sua despensa esparsa.
Seu Ancestral estava recebendo relquias dos esquecidos em cargas martimas. Encontre e devolva-as cidade para serem armazenadas longe das mos de males ocultos.
Com a diligncia destrudo eo Porteiro foi, voc ter que fazer a viagem para o Hamlet a p.

Em Darkest Dungeon voc deve tirar o mximo de uma situao ruim. As misses vo fracassar e algumas devem ser abandonadas. Heris morrero. E quando morrerem, continuaro mortos. O progresso salvo automaticamente e regularmente, de modo que as aes so permanentes.

Enquanto estiver em masmorras, segurar o boto L2 necessrio para trocar as posies de heris, alterar a seleo de heris ou conferir as fichas de personagem. Habilite esta opo se estiver trocando a posio dos heris acidentalmente com frequncia.

Enquanto estiver em masmorras, segurar o boto L2 necessrio para trocar as posies de heris, alterar a seleo de heris ou conferir as fichas de personagem. Habilite esta opo se estiver trocando a posio dos heris acidentalmente com frequncia.

Enquanto estiver em masmorras, segurar o boto L necessrio para trocar as posies de heris, alterar a seleo de heris ou conferir as fichas de personagem. Habilite esta opo se estiver trocando a posio dos heris acidentalmente com frequncia.
Sem touch pad traseiro em masmorras

Ao andar em masmorras, use os botes para esquerda e para a direita para trocar heris, em vez de usar o touch pad traseiro. Habilite esta opo se voc toca acidentalmente no touch pad traseiro com frequncia enquanto est explorando.
Usar os botes para esquerda e para a direita em masmorras
Ao andar em masmorras, use os botes para esquerda e para a direita para trocar heris, em vez de usar os botes L1 e L2.
Interagir com controle esquerdo para cima
Interagir com controle esquerdo para cima
Enquanto estiver em masmorras, apertar para cima com o controle esquerdo pode ser usado para entrar por portas, abrir objetos e aes similares. (Idntico funcionalidade do boto X.)
Ao desligar essa opo, o touch pad traseiro ser desativado e a tela de toque frontal ser usada em seu lugar para as mesmas funes. Faa isso se voc acidentalmente ficar tocando no touch pad traseiro.

Niektre nawyki mog uniemoliwi bohaterowi to zajcie.
Kade zajcie cechuje si odmiennymi kosztami, wartociami agodzenia {colour_start|stressNOT1}stresu{colour_end} i moliwymi efektami ubocznymi. Odkryjesz je samodzielnie w toku rozgrywki.

Zabite potwory pozostawiaj po sobie trucha. Te stanowi za tymczasowe przeszkody, ktre z czasem znikaj samoczynnie.
Moesz atakowa trucha w celu szybszego si ich pozbycia, lecz czsto lepiej jest wykorzysta biegoci dystansowe, biegoci zwizane z przyciganiem/odpychaniem, a nawet posiadane przez niektrych bohaterw biegoci zwizane z usuwaniem truche.

Wystaw sw odwag na prb w szalonym krlestwie polegego przodka. Sprawd, jakie stworzenia si w nim panosz, ale nie zapuszczaj si za daleko.
Czy to jaka apokaliptyczna budowla? Spakuj prowiant na dug podr i zapu si gboko w tunele biegnce pod twym domem. Nanie wyniki swojej ekspedycji na map.
Monstra zamieszkujce niszczejcy dom zamieniy rda wiatoci w obiekty diabelskiego kultu. Oczy otarze Uwicon Esencj i przywr w okolicy wiato.
Udaj si Starym Traktem do lasu i wybierz dowoln z dziesitek mrocznych cieek. Sprawd, dokd prowadzi, i wr w jednym kawaku.
Knieja bya nieprzenikniona, jeszcze zanim zapanoway w niej zarola. Teraz stanowi kwintesencj mrocznego sekretu. Zbierz zapasy i wyrusz w podr, by zapeni map.
Wielu wonicw spotkao w niebezpiecznej Kniei swe przeznaczenie. Niedawno porzucono na trakcie krlewski zapas lekarstw. Mog pomc w odbudowie tej schorowanej osady.
Toczone chorob trucha le rozrzucone po Starym Trakcie, stwarzajc zagroenie dla podrnych. Pozbd si zarazy za pomoc Znakomitego Balsamu.
Apetyt knurw przewysza nawet ich dz krwi. Zima zblia si wielkimi krokami trzeba pomyle o uzupenieniu spichlerza Osady.
Twj Antenat otrzymywa drog morsk nadrealne relikty. Przenie je do osady, gdzie mona je przechowa z dala od podych apsk wikszego za.
Z Stagecoach zniszczone, a dozorca nie ma, trzeba bdzie odby podr do wioski na piechot.

Twoim zadaniem w grze Darkest Dungeon jest wykorzystanie do maksimum marnej sytuacji, w ktrej si znalaze. Misje pozostan niewypenione. Bohaterowie bd umiera. A gdy umr, pozostan martwi. Postpy zapisywane s na bieco, dlatego wszystko, co zrobisz, jest nieodwracalne.

{colour_start|notable}rove odhodln{colour_end} pedstavuje mru ostlenosti hrdiny a pmo psob jako {colour_start|notable}odolnost vi stresu{colour_end}, kter v hrzch kobky me narstat velmi rychle.

Kdy stvry zemou, zanechaj za sebou mrtvoly. Mrtvoly jsou doasnmi pekkami a asem samy zmiz.
Na mrtvoly me toit a zniit je tak rychleji, ale mnohdy bv lep pout dovednosti psobc na dlku, pitahovac nebo odtlaovac dovednosti nebo speciln dovednosti k nien mrtvol, ktermi nkte hrdinov disponuj.
K pomoci hrdinm vyuij tbornick dovednosti.
Hluboko uvnit zcench chodeb domu tvch pedk provd nekromant nevslovn rituly... dokonce oivuje mrtv! Nesm to pokraovat.
Kdosi vyprv o stve tak nevslovn hroziv, e ji vesnian zaali uctvat jako svho pna. Mon je to jenom historka, ale takovou hrozbu nelze jen tak pejt.

Pomstychtiv duchov hroz, e do svho temnho panstv sthnou ve, co jsme vybudovali. Dopej jim jednou provdy nmonickou smrt!

Vyzkouej svou slu v lenm krlovstv padlho pedka. Vmej si stvr, kter ho te obvaj, ale neputuj pli daleko.
Bl se snad apokalypsa? Popadni zsoby a vydej se do nejvtch hlubin tunel sv mrtv rodiny. Ze sv expedice piprav mapu.
Zvrcen zrdy obvajc zboen dm promnily majky Svtla v ndoby belskho uctvn. Vyisti tyto olte pomoc posvtn esence a pivolej Svtlo nazpt.
Vydej se po Star cest do lesa a pot si vyber kteroukoli z tuct temnch cest. Podvej se, kam ta cesta vede a pak se vra s hlavou dosud pevn na svch ramenou.
Pahorkatina byla u ped pchodem zkzy tm neprostupn. Te je mstem temnoty. Dobe se zsob a vyprav se na expedici s clem zmapovat co nejvt kus krajiny.
Na nebezpem protkan cest Pahorkatinou nalo smrt mnoho povoznk. Nedvno se tam ztratila i krlova zsilka liv. Pi pestavb vesnice by nm hodn pomohla.
Na Star cest le rozesety hnisajc mrtvoly, ve kterch se hromad nemoci. Pstupov cesty do vesnice jsou tak zdrojem nkaz. Zni hnilobu pomoc silnho balzmu.
Touha vep rt je dokonce jet vt ne jejich touha po krvi. Zima vdy h za humny a vesnici by prosplo, kdyby si doplnila potravinov sklady.
Tvj pedek si nechval poslat nadpozemsk relikvie po moi. Najdi je a vra je do msta, kde budou ped nenechavma rukama zla v bezpe.
S zniil dostavnk a domovnk pry, budete muset vytvoit cestu k Hamletovi pky.

V Nejtemnj kobce mus z kad patn situace vytit maximum. Vpravy se nezda a bude z nich muset utkat. Hrdinov budou umrat. A pokud umou, zstanou mrtv. Postup se neustle automaticky ukld, take cokoli udl, bude navdy.

A budete v kobce, budete muset za elem zmny pozice hrdiny, zmny vbru hrdiny nebo zobrazen strnky postavy dret tlatko L2. Tuto funkci zapnte v ppad, pokud se vm asto stv, e nemysln zmnte pozici hrdiny.

Bez zadnho dotykovho panelu v kobce
Pi chzi v kobkch budete k prohazovn hrdin pouvat tlatka doleva a doprava namsto zadnho dotykovho panelu. Tuto monost zapnte v ppad, e pi przkumu asto omylem makte zadn dotykov panel.
Pouvn tlatek doleva a doprava v kobce
Pi chzi v kobkch budete k prohazovn hrdin pouvat tlatka doleva a doprava namsto tlatek L1 a L2.
V kobkch mete stiskem lev pky nahoru otevrat dvee, rekvizity a provdt podobn akce. (Duplikuje funkci tlatka s kkem.)
Vypnutm tto volby se deaktivuje zadn dotykov panel a k ovldn se pouv pedn dotykov obrazovka. Hod se to v ppadech, kdy se vm asto stv, e zadn dotykov panel stisknete omylem.

Seleziona ciascun eroe con {colour_start|notable}[LEVETTA SINISTRA] pi [TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} e poi usa nuovamente {colour_start|notable}[LEVETTA SINISTRA] pi [TASTO CROCE]{colour_end}per collocare l'eroe nella tua squadra attiva sulla destra.

Visto che sei qui, cogli l'occasione per {colour_start|notable}potenziare la rete della Diligenza{colour_end} spendendo alcuni dei tuoi cimeli di partenza. Cos facendo aumenterai il numero di eroi disponibili qui in futuro.
Per potenziarla, clicca sul simbolo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[+]{colour_end} a sinistra e poi sul potenziamento.

Visto che sei qui, cogli l'occasione per {colour_start|notable}potenziare la rete della Diligenza{colour_end} spendendo alcuni dei tuoi cimeli di partenza. Cos facendo aumenterai il numero di eroi disponibili qui in futuro.
Per potenziarla, tieni premuto {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} per accedere al menu dei potenziamenti e poi usa {colour_start|notable}[LEVETTA SINISTRA] pi [TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per acquistare i potenziamenti.

Visto che sei qui, cogli l'occasione per {colour_start|notable}potenziare la rete della Diligenza{colour_end} spendendo alcuni dei tuoi cimeli di partenza. Cos facendo aumenterai il numero di eroi disponibili qui in futuro.
Per potenziarla, tieni premuto il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO L]{colour_end} per accedere al menu dei potenziamenti e poi usa {colour_start|notable}[LEVETTA SINISTRA] pi [TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per acquistare i potenziamenti.

Dopo aver soddisfatto i requisiti di una missione, puoi scegliere di {colour_start|notable}ritornare al villaggio{colour_end} in qualsiasi momento, premendo {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH PAD DESTRO]{colour_end}. Non devi tornare alla stanza iniziale della segreta per uscire.

Dopo aver soddisfatto i requisiti di una missione, puoi scegliere di {colour_start|notable}ritornare al villaggio{colour_end} in qualsiasi momento, premendo {colour_start|notable}[TASTO START]{colour_end}. Non devi tornare alla stanza iniziale della segreta per uscire.

Quando un eroe selezionato, premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO QUADRATO]{colour_end} per accedere a un quadro dettagliato di tutte le {colour_start|notable}ossessioni{colour_end}, {colour_start|notable}abilit{colour_end} e {colour_start|notable}resistenze{colour_end} dell'eroe.

In qualsiasi schermata del gioco, premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD SINISTRO]{colour_end} per visualizzare il contesto.
Provalo nel villaggio o quando esplori, lotti, fai campeggio o altro.

In qualsiasi schermata del gioco, premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO SELECT]{colour_end} e scegli {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[AIUTO]{colour_end} per visualizzare il contesto.
Provalo nel villaggio o quando esplori, lotti, fai campeggio o altro.

Il combattimento si svolge {colour_start|notable}a turni{colour_end}. Quando tocca al tuo eroe, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELEZIONA]{colour_end} un'icona dell'abilit e poi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SELEZIONA]{colour_end} un bersaglio.
Se non puoi selezionare una determinata abilit, perch quell'eroe deve {colour_start|notable}trovarsi in una posizione differente{colour_end} o {colour_start|notable}nessun bersaglio valido{colour_end} disponibile. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[EVIDENZIA]{colour_end} l'abilit per vederne i requisiti.

Al momento sei in una {colour_start|notable}stanza{colour_end}.
Per muoverti verso un'altra, usa la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA DESTRA]{colour_end} per selezionare una {colour_start|notable}stanza di arrivo{colour_end} sulla {colour_start|notable}mappa{colour_end}. Cos facendo accederai al {colour_start|notable}corridoio di collegamento{colour_end}.
(Premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CERCHIO]{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Al momento sei in una {colour_start|notable}stanza{colour_end}.

In alternativa, puoi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCARE]{colour_end} la stanza di arrivo sullo schermo.

Quando ti trovi in un {colour_start|notable}corridoio{colour_end}, usa la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA SINISTRA]{colour_end} per muoverti avanti o indietro.
(Premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CERCHIO]{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Mentre esplori, incontrerai spesso {colour_start|notable}oggetti interattivi{colour_end}. Premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per ispezionarli con l'eroe attivo. Dai un'occhiata a questa tenda...
(Premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CERCHIO]{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Il tuo eroe sta {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}sanguinando{colour_end}!
Se lo desideri, puoi usare una {colour_start|notable}benda{colour_end} nell'inventario per tamponare il sanguinamento. Seleziona una benda e premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end} per usarla quando il turno dell'eroe ferito.

Seleziona e usa antidoti, bende o erbe medicinali nell'inventario con {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA SINISTRA]{colour_end} e {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end} per curare rispettivamente INFEZIONI, EMORRAGIE o MORBI nell'eroe selezionato.

La {colour_start|notable}luce{colour_end} si sta affievolendo! L'attuale {colour_start|notable}livello delle torce influenza enormemente molte meccaniche{colour_end} del gioco. Pi fa buio, pi le situazioni si complicano e le ricompense diventano maggiori. Seleziona una torcia nell'inventario e premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end} per consumarla e ripristinare il livello di luce.

In questa missione dovrai fare {colour_start|notable}campeggio{colour_end} e ci richiede {colour_start|notable}legna da ardere{colour_end}. Quest'ultima ti verr {colour_start|notable}automaticamente assegnata{colour_end} in missioni specifiche.
Il {colour_start|notable}campeggio{colour_end} offre agli eroi l'opportunit di {colour_start|notable}tirare il fiato all'interno della segreta{colour_end}. Quando sei ferito o stressato e hai bisogno di fare campeggio, seleziona la legna da ardere nel tuo inventario e premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end}.

Le {colour_start|trap}trappole{colour_end} localizzate saranno {colour_start|notable}visibili sul terreno{colour_end} quando ti ci avvicini. Seleziona un eroe e premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} in prossimit della {colour_start|trap}trappola{colour_end} per tentare di {colour_start|notable}disinnescarla{colour_end}.
Alcuni eroi sono pi bravi a farlo di altri.
Per aprire una {colour_start|notable}porta{colour_end}, premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} quando ce l'hai di fronte.

Ogni eroe dispone di due slot per equipaggiare altrettanti oggetti, chiamati {colour_start|notable}accessori{colour_end}. Selezionane uno nell'inventario e premi il {colour_start|notable}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per equipaggiarlo. Gli {colour_start|notable}accessori{colour_end} sono equi: hanno pregi ma anche difetti, e alcuni sono riservati a una specifica classe di eroi.

Puoi rivendere gli accessori indesiderati nel tuo inventario degli accessori e ricavarci qualche quattrino. Apri l'inventario degli accessori con il {colour_start|notable}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end}, seleziona quello che non vuoi pi e vendilo con il [TASTO QUADRATO].

Una perlustrazione eseguita alla perfezione pu svelare a volte una {colour_start|notable}stanza segreta{colour_end}! Vai sulla casella contrassegnata da una stella e premi il {colour_start|notable}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per entrare. Coloro che portano con s una {colour_start|notable}chiave{colour_end} rimarranno accecati dai tesori che contiene...

A fine missione, le provviste non utilizzate verranno scartate e non riceverai rimborso alcuno. Compra lo stretto necessario!
Porta sempre con te del cibo e delle torce! Ogni eroe consuma di norma 1 unit di cibo a pasto (evento campeggio o carestia) e anche nelle missioni pi brevi almeno 8 torce sono indispensabili.

Quando selezioni un bersaglio con la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA SINISTRA]{colour_end}, puoi vedere le statistiche del nemico, la possibilit dell'eroe di colpirlo e la quantit di danni che l'abilit attuale pu infliggergli.
Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO QUADRATO]{colour_end} per vedere una scheda del personaggio dettagliata dell'eroe.
Tieni premuto {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L2]{colour_end} per visualizzare il livello di luce attuale e gli effetti di stato dell'eroe/mostro.
Tieni premuto il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO L]{colour_end} per visualizzare gli effetti di gioco come livello di luce e condizioni dello stato dell'eroe.

Seleziona e usa antidoti, bende o erbe medicinali nell'inventario con il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end} per curare rispettivamente INFEZIONI, EMORRAGIE o MORBI nell'eroe selezionato.

Usa la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA SINISTRA]{colour_end} per evidenziare un'unit di cibo e premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per mangiarla. La quantit dipende dall'abbondanza del tuo inventario.
La tua compagnia ha {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[12 PUNTI TREGUA]{colour_end} da spendere per usare abilit di campeggio.

Usa {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L1 e R1]{colour_end} per selezionare un eroe e poi la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA SINISTRA e il TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per usare un'abilit. Alcune hanno bisogno di un bersaglio.

Usa {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH PAD POSTERIORE]{colour_end} per selezionare un eroe e poi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA SINISTRA e TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per usare un'abilit. Alcune hanno bisogno di un bersaglio.
Quando hai terminato di spendere PUNTI TREGUA, premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO TRIANGOLO]{colour_end} per concludere il campeggio.
Usa la {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEVETTA DESTRA]{colour_end} per selezionare una stanza di arrivo sulla mappa.
Tieni premuto [L2] e premi il [TASTO CERCHIO] per ridurre la fiamma della torcia.
Tieni premuto [L2] e premi il [TASTO CERCHIO] ripetutamente per spegnere la torcia.
Il tuo file di salvataggio danneggiato. La tenuta non pu essere caricata.
Premi il [TASTO CROCE] per rimuovere i fumetti quando parlano gli eroi.
[TASTO TRIANGOLO premuto] per scartare un oggetto.
Premi il [TASTO CROCE] per sottoporre l'eroe al trattamento.
Premi il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TASTO CROCE]{colour_end} per reclutare nella squadra.
Premi il [TASTO CROCE] per sottoporre l'eroe al trattamento.

Tieni premuto il [TASTO L] e premi il [TASTO CERCHIO] per ridurre la fiamma della torcia.
Tieni premuto il [TASTO L] e premi il [TASTO CERCHIO] ripetutamente per spegnere la torcia.
